name: level
description: The height of the block, from the genesis block

name: proto
description: Number of protocol changes since genesis (mod 256)

name: predecessor
description: The hash of the preceding block

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp at which the block is claimed to have been created

name: validation_pass
description: Number of validation passes (also number of lists of lists of operations)

name: operations_hash
description: The hash of a list of root hashes of Merkle trees of operations. There is one list of operations per validation pass

name: fitness
description: A sequence of sequences of unsigned bytes, ordered by length and then lexicographically. It represents the claimed fitness of the chain ending in this block

name: context
description: Hash of context (Base58Check-encoded)

name: protocol
description: Protocol version

name: chain_id
description: Network identifier (Base58Check-encoded)

name: block_hash
description: Block identifier (Base58Check-encoded)

name: nonce_hash
description: A commitment to a random number, used to generate entropy on the chain

name: consumed_gas
description: Gas consumed in a block

name: baker
description: Public key hash of block baker (Base58Check-encoded)

name: voting_period_kind
description: The kind of the voting period

name: cycle
description: Block cycle

name: cycle_position
description: Cycle position

name: voting_period
description: Voting period

name: voting_period_position
description: Voting period position

name: expected_commitment
description: Expected commitment

name: number_of_operation_groups
description: The number of operation groups in a block

name: number_of_operations
description: The number of operations in a block
